失礼ながら: (しつれいながら) - with all due respect; if I may make bold to ask
失礼乍ら: (しつれいながら) - with all due respect; if I may make bold to ask
失礼千万: (しつれいせんばん) - (yoji) extremely rude (impertinent, impolite)
失礼至極: (しつれいしごく) - extremely rude; impertinent; impolite
失神: (しっしん) - faint; trance; swoon; stupefaction
失笑: (しっしょう) - laughing at an inappropriate time/not being able to hold back one's laughter; scornful laughter/snicker/snigger
失笑を買う: (しっしょうをかう) - to be laughed at; to get oneself laughed at (e.g. by doing something stupid)
失脚: (しっきゃく) - losing one's standing; being overthrown; falling
失血死: (しっけつし) - dying from blood loss; bleeding to death; hemorrhaging to death
失行: (しっこう) - (ethical) mistake; apraxia (inability to purposely perform some actions)
失言: (しつげん) - verbal gaffe; verbal slip; slip of the tongue; using improper words
失認症: (しつにんしょう) - agnosia (loss of ability to recognize objects, persons, sounds, shapes, or smells)
失語: (しつご) - forgetting the words; inability to pronounce a word correctly
失語症: (しつごしょう) - aphasia (loss of speech)
失踪宣告: (しっそうせんこく) - court decision declaring a missing person legally dead
失踪者: (しっそうしゃ) - missing person; runaway
失速: (しっそく) - stall (in flying)/stalling; suddenly losing momentum/downturn/slump/weakening/decline
夷: (い) - Barbarian , provincial (ou seja, uma pessoa que mora longe da cidade); brutish, unsophisticated warrior (esp. used by Kyoto samurai to refer to samurai from eastern Japan); foreigner, barbarian
夷則: (いそく) - (in China) 9th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. A sharp); seventh lunar month
夷振り: (ひなぶり) - appearing rustic; ancient song played at the court; comical tanka
夷曲: (ひなぶり) - appearing rustic; ancient song played at the court; comical tanka
夷蛮戎狄: (いばんじゅうてき) - (yoji) the barbarians beyond the borders of old China
夷講: (えびすこう) - fete in honor of Ebisu (honour)
夾侍: (きょうじ) - flanking attendant to the main deity of veneration in a temple
夾竹桃: (きょうちくとう) - oleander; Nerium oleander var. indicum; rosebay
夾角: (きょうかく) - contained angle; included angle
夾鐘: (きょうしょう) - (in China) 4th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. F); second lunar month
夾雑物: (きょうざつぶつ) - foreign element; impurity; admixture
奄美の黒兎: (アマミノクロウサギ) - Amami rabbit (Pentalagus furnessi); Ryukyu rabbit
奄美鼻先蛙: (アマミハナサキガエル) - Amami tip-nosed frog (Odorrana amamiensis)
奇々怪々: (ききかいかい) - (yoji) very strange; bizarre; weird; mysterious
奇しくも: (くしくも) - strangely; oddly; miraculously; mysteriously
奇っ怪: (きっかい) - strange; wonderful; weird; outrageous; mysterious
奇をてらう: (きをてらう) - to make a display of one's originality (eccentricity); to deliberately act oddly (e.g. to get attention)
奇を衒う: (きをてらう) - to make a display of one's originality (eccentricity); to deliberately act oddly (e.g. to get attention)
奇乳: (きにゅう) - witch's milk (milk secreted by some neonates)
奇人: (きじん) - queer fellow; odd fellow; eccentric person; crank; oddball; freak
奇偶検査ビット: (きぐうけんさビット) - parity bit
奇兵: (きへい) - (ant: 正兵) irregular soldiers; commandos
奇兵隊: (きへいたい) - kiheitai (irregular militia during the Bakumatsu period)
奇勝: (きしょう) - (奇勝 only) beauty spot/place with beautiful scenery; unexpected victory/victory by uncommon stratagem
奇天烈: (キテレツ) - very strange; odd; queer
奇奇怪怪: (ききかいかい) - (yoji) very strange; bizarre; weird; mysterious
奇妙な話だが: (きみょうなはなしだが) - curiously enough; oddly enough; strange to tell
奇岩: (きがん) - strangely shaped rocks; massive rock of unusual shape
奇岩怪石: (きがんかいせき) - strangely shaped rocks and bizarre stones
奇巌: (きがん) - strangely shaped rocks; massive rock of unusual shape
奇弁: (きべん) - sophistry; sophism; chicanery; play on words
奇形腫: (きけいしゅ) - teratoma; teratocarcinoma; teratoid tumor
奇御魂: (くしみたま) - spirit who possesses a wondrous power
奇怪: (きっかい) - strange; wonderful; weird; outrageous; mysterious
奇怪千万: (きっかいせんばん) - (yoji) very strange (mysterious, weird); bizarre; monstrous; outrageous
奇想天外: (きそうてんがい) - (yoji) fantastic idea; bizarre
奇態なことに: (きたいなことに) - strange to say; strangely enough; it is a wonder that
